sentences.sentence: A song with a flute obbligato.
A brave girl! With the obbligato "dragon 's offspring", she finished the "impossible mission"!
sentences.translation: 勇敢的女孩，在“龙的传人”的伴奏下忍着伤痛完成了“不可能完成的任务”！

sentences.sentence: Soon his right arm reached around to the other side of the child and he added a running obbligato.
sentences.translation: 很快，他的右臂绕过小男孩的另一侧，增加了一段连续的伴奏。
